translations: 给……加盐（salt 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: This is your chance to try the ancient art of salting.
sentences.translation: 这次你可以尝试古老的盐腌法。

sentences.sentence: And while you're de-salting your diet, don't forget the salt in processed foods.
sentences.translation: 在改用低盐饮食的同时，不要忘了加工食品中的盐分。

sentences.sentence: We will also describe the smoking process.Another method of preparing fish is called dry salting.
sentences.translation: 我们也将描述熏制法的过程。干盐腌制法是另一个制备保存鱼的方法。
